Patterns packageÔÉÅ

This page documents the patterns package which contains small reusable design-pattern utilities used across the project (Command, Observer, Mediator, Memento, Prototype, Decorator, Singleton, Iterator).

  • patterns.command
  • patterns.mediator
  • patterns.memento
  • patterns.observer
  • patterns.prototype
  • patterns.singleton

patterns.decorator

Decorator patterns for structure upgrades.

patterns.iterator

Utilities for iterator patterns used in the project.

Note

The documentation is generated from module docstrings. If your environment lacks graphical dependencies (e.g. pygame), use the mocking approach in conf.py described in the project docs.
